quote: Handwritten notes spent way more money, were more loyal, left better reviews, and were happier clients.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the unexpected power of handwritten notes in increasing customer loyalty and spending.
suggested_hook: Discover why a simple handwritten note can transform your client relationships.

quote: This is the one medium that defies the time space continuum... handwritten notes will end up on their kitchen counter or even on their mantle.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the lasting impact of handwritten notes in a digital world.
suggested_hook: Why do handwritten notes have a timeless impact on clients?
